descriptions.description:
NAOqi barcode reader service.
Reads EAN13, EAN128, Code39.
To start scanning : BarcodeReader.start To stop scanning : BarcodeReader.stop Scan event: BarcodeReader.onBarcodeDetected(type, value)

NAOqi barcode reader service.
Reads EAN13, EAN128, Code39.
To start scanning : BarcodeReader.start To stop scanning : BarcodeReader.stop Scan event: BarcodeReader.onBarcodeDetected(type, value)
